Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A gene encoding a novel transmembrane protein was identified by DNA sequence analysis within the insulin - dependent diabetes mellitus ( IDDM ) locus IDDM4 on chromosome 11q13 .

Let's think step by step.

| Insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus (IDDM) |
| IDDM4 |

Note: The term "IDDM" is used interchangeably with "type 1 diabetes" in some contexts.
